title: Book Review: ‘Martha Graham: When Dance Became Modern,’ by Neil Baldwin
description: The most revealing statements in a new biography come from the dancers who gave their lives and bodies to her experiments.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
category: Martha Graham: When Dance Became Modern: A Life (Book)
media:description: Martha Graham in “Clytemnestra,” 1960. Agnes de Mille said Graham was “among the last of the sacrificial females.”
